titles.title: The Fire And Chastening Of My Father

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The fire and the chastening of my Father
Only come so I might have the life
That He desires to bring forth in me,
So I can be free, so you can be free.
Chorus:
I shall be free to praise His holy name
I shall be free to walk in His pure love,
I shall be free to do His perfect will.
I shall be free so you can be free

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'll lay down my life, I'll give my all for you
So that the life of my God might shine forth,
That perfect life that will set creation free;
And I shall be free so you can be free.
Chorus:
We shall be free to praise His holy name.
We shall be free to walk in His pure love.
We shall be free to do His perfect will.
We shall be free; yes, we shall be free.
